languages.text: {n}Сервочереп Иокасты оживает и со скрежетом проецирует голограмму на палубу. На вас смотрит размытая копия Энриха Монтэга. Кровь сочится из раны на виске, рука перевязана жгутом, другой он прикуривает папиросу.{/n} "Эй, на мостике, как слышно меня?.. Ха, вижу, псалмы доступа вы сменить не успели. Ну что, празднуешь победу, {name}?"

{n}Her servo-skull rattles to life and projects a hologram onto the deck. A blurred replica of Einrich Monteg stares at you, blood oozing from a wound on his temple. One of his hands is bound with a tourniquet, and he is lighting a lho-stick with the other.{/n} "Hey, bridge, do you copy? I see you have not yet changed the access psalms. Are you celebrating your victory, {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Сервочереп Иокасты оживает и со скрежетом проецирует голограмму на палубу. На вас смотрит размытая копия Энриха Монтэга. Кровь сочится из раны на виске, рука перевязана жгутом, другой он прикуривает папиросу.{/n} "Эй, на мостике, как слышно меня?.. Ха, вижу, псалмы доступа вы сменить не успели. Ну что, празднуешь победу, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jocasta's servo-skull rattles to life and projects a hologram onto the deck. A blurred replica of Einrich Monteg stares at you. Blood oozes from a wound on his temple, one hand is bound with a tourniquet, and he is lighting a cigarette with the other.{/n} "Hey, bridge, do you copy? I see you haven't changed the access psalms yet. Are you celebrating victory, {name}?"

I see you haven't changed the access psalms yet. Are you celebrating victory, {name}?"

languages.text: {n}Su servocráneo cobra vida y proyecta un holograma en la cubierta. Una réplica borrosa de Einrich Monteg te mira. Ves que brota sangre de una herida que tiene en la sien. Una de sus manos está atada con un torniquete e intenta encender un cigarrillo de lho con la otra.{/n} «Hola, puente, ¿me recibís? Veo que no habéis cambiado los salmos de acceso. ¿Celebrando ya la victoria, {name}?».
languages.original_text: {n}Her servo-skull rattles to life and projects a hologram onto the deck. A blurred replica of Einrich Monteg stares at you, blood oozing from a wound on his temple. One of his hands is bound with a tourniquet, and he is lighting a lho-stick with the other.{/n} "Hey, bridge, do you copy? I see you have not yet changed the access psalms. Are you celebrating your victory, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Su servocráneo cobra vida y proyecta un holograma en la cubierta. Una réplica borrosa de Einrich Monteg te mira. Ves que brota sangre de una herida que tiene en la sien. Una de sus manos está atada con un torniquete e intenta encender un cigarrillo de lho con la otra.{/n} «Hola, puente, ¿me recibís? Veo que no habéis cambiado los salmos de acceso. ¿Celebrando ya la victoria, {name}?».

languages.text: {n}サーヴォスカルがガタガタと音を立てて、デッキにホログラムが映し出される。アインリッヒ・モンテグのぼやけたレプリカがこちらを見つめて、こめかみの傷から血がにじみ出ている。片方の手は止血帯で縛られ、もう片方の手でルホスティックに火をつけている。{/n}「ブリッジ、聞こえるかな？まだアクセス詩篇を変えていないようですね。勝利を祝っているのですか、{name}様？」
languages.original_text: {n}Her servo-skull rattles to life and projects a hologram onto the deck. A blurred replica of Einrich Monteg stares at you, blood oozing from a wound on his temple. One of his hands is bound with a tourniquet, and he is lighting a lho-stick with the other.{/n} "Hey, bridge, do you copy? I see you have not yet changed the access psalms. Are you celebrating your victory, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴォスカルがガタガタと音を立てて、デッキにホログラムが映し出される。アインリッヒ・モンテグのぼやけたレプリカがこちらを見つめて、こめかみの傷から血がにじみ出ている。片方の手は止血帯で縛られ、もう片方の手でアイホスティックに火をつけている。{/n}「ブリッジ、聞こえるかな？まだアクセスプラズマを変えていないようですね。勝利を祝っているのですか、{name}様？」

languages.text: {n}她的伺服头骨嗡嗡作响，将全息图像投射到甲板上。艾因里奇·蒙特格模糊的身影正盯着你，血从太阳穴上的伤口渗了出来。他的一只手上绑着止血带，另一只手正在点麻烟。{/n}“嘿，舰桥，收到了吗？看起来，你们的颂歌好像还没改过来。你这是在庆祝胜利吗，{name}？”
languages.original_text: {n}Her servo-skull rattles to life and projects a hologram onto the deck. A blurred replica of Einrich Monteg stares at you, blood oozing from a wound on his temple. One of his hands is bound with a tourniquet, and he is lighting a lho-stick with the other.{/n} "Hey, bridge, do you copy? I see you have not yet changed the access psalms. Are you celebrating your victory, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}她的伺服头骨嗡嗡作响，将全息图像投射到甲板上。艾因里奇·蒙特格模糊的身影正盯着你，血从太阳穴上的伤口渗了出来。他的一只手上绑着止血带，另一只手正在点麻烟。{/n}“嘿，舰桥，收到了吗？看起来，你们的颂歌好像还没改过来。你这是在庆祝胜利吗，{name}？”

languages.text: {n}Ihr Servoschädel erwacht zum Leben und projiziert ein Hologramm auf das Deck. Eine verschwommene Kopie von Einrich Monteg starrt dich an. Blut tropft aus einer Wunde an seiner Schläfe. Eine seiner Hände ist mit einem Verband umwickelt, mit der anderen zündet er sich einen Lho-Stab an.{/n} "Hey, Brücke, bitte kommen? Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr die Zugangspsalmen noch nicht geändert. Feiert Ihr Euren Sieg, {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Her servo-skull rattles to life and projects a hologram onto the deck. A blurred replica of Einrich Monteg stares at you, blood oozing from a wound on his temple. One of his hands is bound with a tourniquet, and he is lighting a lho-stick with the other.{/n} "Hey, bridge, do you copy? I see you have not yet changed the access psalms. Are you celebrating your victory, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihr Servoschädel erwacht zum Leben und projiziert ein Hologramm auf das Deck. Eine verschwommene Kopie von Einrich Monteg starrt dich an. Blut tropft aus einer Wunde an seiner Schläfe. Eine seiner Hände ist mit einem Verband umwickelt, mit der anderen zündet er sich einen Lho-Stab an.{/n} "Hey, Brücke, bitte kommen? Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr die Zugangspsalmen noch nicht geändert. Feiert Ihr Euren Sieg, {name}?"

languages.text: {n}Son servocrâne s'anime soudainement pour projeter sur la passerelle un hologramme flou d'Einrich Monteg. Malgré une blessure à la tempe et le garrot qui enserre l'une de ses mains, il parvient à allumer un cigalho de sa main valide.{/n} « Hé, la passerelle, vous me recevez ? Je vois que vous avez pas encore changé les psaumes d'accès. Alors, {name}, vous célébrez déjà la victoire ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Her servo-skull rattles to life and projects a hologram onto the deck. A blurred replica of Einrich Monteg stares at you, blood oozing from a wound on his temple. One of his hands is bound with a tourniquet, and he is lighting a lho-stick with the other.{/n} "Hey, bridge, do you copy? I see you have not yet changed the access psalms. Are you celebrating your victory, {name}?"

languages.text: {n}Hizmeleti çalışmaya başlıyor ve güverteye bir hologram yansıtıyor. Einrich Monteg'in şakaklarındaki yaradan kan sızan, bulanık bir sureti sana bakıyor. Ellerinin biri turnikeyle bağlı, diğer eliyle de bir liho dalı yakıyor.{/n} "Köprü, duyuyor musunuz? Bakıyorum da erişim ilahilerini daha değiştirmemişsiniz. Zaferini mi kutluyorsun {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Her servo-skull rattles to life and projects a hologram onto the deck. A blurred replica of Einrich Monteg stares at you, blood oozing from a wound on his temple. Are you celebrating your victory, {name}?"
